meanings.sent1: When you don't rest, your health worsens.
meanings.sent2: If you keep adding salt, the soup worsens.
meanings.sent3: The situation worsens when the cat chases the mouse in circles.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the leak in the roof only worsens the problem.
meanings.sent5: The storm worsens, darkening the sky with each passing minute.

meanings.definition: To deteriorate in quality or condition.
meanings.sent1: Leaving the fruit out in the sun worsens its freshness.
meanings.sent2: The old book worsens with each page turn.
meanings.sent3: The taste of the soup worsens when you add too much spice.
meanings.sent4: The relationship worsens, like a ship sinking in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The fabric of the shirt worsens, fraying at the edges over time.
